kpi.name: M1006C125

kpi_info.title: ACTIVE SET UPDATE RL DEL ATTEMPTS
kpi_info.use: The number of attempted radio link deletions with an active set update procedure. When an RRC: ACTIVE SET UPDATE message is sent by the serving RNC to the UE for deleting one or more radio links to the active set. The counter is updated by the number of radio links that are attempted to delete from the active set, also in a cell replacement procedure.The counter is updated for the cells tried to be deleted from the active set. In case of DRNC cell, object WBTS-0/WCEL-0 is used.

kpi.kpi_alias: ACTIVE SET UPDATE RL DEL ATTEMPTS
